name: plant daddy [demo]
description:
plant daddy is an eminently laid-back browser game about raising houseplants in your sunny Chicago apartment.

Your plants grow slowly in real time–water them, repot them, buy new furniture, and then close the tab and come back after they've had some time to grow.

This is a demo, completed for the Devtober jam! The game is very nearly feature-complete. You can expect some updates to include:

  • New Furniture
  • New Plants
  • Some plant-raisin' tools

 Created by Brady Soglin.
